alert.note: Alert for Florence; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 01 at 10:25AM EDT until further notice by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Carolina... Great Pee Dee River At Pee Dee affecting Marion and Florence Counties. For the Great Pee Dee River...including Pee Dee, Bennettsville 10sw...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Great Pee Dee River At Pee Dee. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Flood waters will affect swamplands and logging interests. Flood waters will affect timberland as far downstream as Yauhannah two weeks after the crest passes Pee Dee. Logging equipment needs to be moved. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EDT Monday the stage was 18.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening and continue rising to a crest of 21.0 feet early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=ilm . The next statement will be issued by this evening.
